column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I just want to go on the record and say
column2: Chicago style pizza is not very good (Chicago pride keeps many from speaking up about such a touchy subject)
column3: BUT if you're going to get pizza thats not wood or coal fired
column4: get Lou's. Their crust is the best
column5: and really just in general the ingredients are better (referring to Gino's
column7: etc). Get the cookie pizza desert. They say money can't buy happiness
column8: but I don't think whoever said that tried a cookie pizza here.
